welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heerenveen, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all the unique experiences and delights this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeuwarden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Leeuwarden Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eelde Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Eelde Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
